pullRequest.title: Codegen Migration of Admin REST APIs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
A code generator is used to generate server-side code skeletons using a swagger specification. Currently, a proprietary code generator plugin is used for Admin REST APIs. This PR migrates the code generator of the Admin REST APIs to the swagger-codegen.
Resolves: wso2/product-apim#7977
Goals

Migrate the code generator of the Admin REST APIs to the swagger-codegen.
Migrate the scopes from x-scopes to default swagger specification supported scopes in the admin-api.yaml file.
Transfer the Implementation and Util codes of previous Admin REST APIs appropriately.

Approach

Created a new directory as org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin.v1 under components/apimgt. (Duplicated the org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin directory and removed unnecessary files and directories).
Added the swagger-codegen-maven-plugin to the pom.xml of org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin.v1.  Slightly modified code templates were used to generate the relevant code segments instead of the default code templates used by swagger-codegen.
Migrated the scopes from x-scopes to default swagger specification supported scopes in admin-api.yaml
Built org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin.v1. This creates the necessary server-side code skeletons and DTOs under src/gen/java.
Copied the utils codes from org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin directory to org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin.v1 diretory and made relevant changes.
Copied the Implementation codes from org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin directory to org.wso2.carbon.apimgt.rest.api.admin.v1 directory and made relevant changes.
Enabled obtaining admin resource mappings for admin v1 REST API which would be used for scope validation.

Test environment
JDK 1.8.0_241
Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS

commit.message: Set-up admin REST APIs with swagger-codegen-maven-plugin
Migrate the scopes to swagger spec supported scopes
Add ThrottlePolicy changes in yaml and auto-generated DTOs
Add util codes to admin v1 rest API directory
Enable obtaining admin resource mappings for admin v1 REST API
Introduce Settings API to the list of admin v1 REST APIs
Add implementation codes of admin v1 REST APIs
Fix formatting issues and License headers of util codes
Add /swagger.yaml resource to the admin v1 REST API
Whitelist the admin v1 settings API
Update admin v1 REST API pom.xml version

nodes.bodyText: is this an autogenerated file? if not don't we need a new line eof?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+# Swagger Codegen Ignore
+# Generated by swagger-codegen https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-codegen
+
+# Use this file to prevent files from being overwritten by the generator.
+# The patterns follow closely to .gitignore or .dockerignore.
+
+# As an example, the C# client generator defines ApiClient.cs.
+# You can make changes and tell Swagger Codgen to ignore just this file by uncommenting the following line:
+#ApiClient.cs
+
+# You can match any string of characters against a directory, file or extension with a single asterisk (*):
+#foo/*/qux
+# The above matches foo/bar/qux and foo/baz/qux, but not foo/bar/baz/qux
+
+# You can recursively match patterns against a directory, file or extension with a double asterisk (**):
+#foo/**/qux
+# This matches foo/bar/qux, foo/baz/qux, and foo/bar/baz/qux
+
+# You can also negate patterns with an exclamation (!).
+# For example, you can ignore all files in a docs folder with the file extension .md:
+#docs/*.md
+# Then explicitly reverse the ignore rule for a single file:
+#!docs/README.md
+
+**/RestApplication.java
+**/test/**
+swagger.json
+pom.xml
